title: Fighter Spells
content: 2 Conjuration Bonus Action Level 2 Spell Slot Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see. Range: 18m Phantasmal Force Level 2 Illusion Action Level 2 Spell Slot Deal damage to a creature each turn. The type of damage changes to the last type the creature suffered.10 turns18m INT Save Concentration Ray of Enfeeblement Level 2 Necromancy Action Level 2 Spell Slot Weaken a foe: they deal half damage with weapon attacks using Strength. 18m Concentration Scorching Ray
